item.dragonscales_armor.desc: Increased protection from dragon breath attacks
item.iceandfire.air_pods.desc: Oh my God Steve has AirPods in he cant hear us!
item.iceandfire.stymphalian_arrow.desc: The metallic fletching enables the arrow to soar like a bird.
item.iceandfire.amphithere_arrow.desc: Knocks all mobs back with the power of an ampithere's wings!
item.iceandfire.sea_serpent_armor.desc_1: Provides Strength when wet, increasing levels with full set
item.iceandfire.chain.desc_0: Similar to a lead, can be tied to wall blocks
item.iceandfire.chain.desc_1: Cannot be broken, Can be used on most mobs
item.iceandfire.chain_sticky.desc_2: Used to connect two chained mobs
item.iceandfire.deathworm_gauntlet.desc_: Lashes target with its tongue for 3 damage
item.iceandfire.pixie_wand.desc_0: Shoots a magic charge that deals 5 damage and makes target levitate
item.iceandfire.myrmex_swarm.desc_0: Summons 5 Myrmex Swarmers that will defend you for 30 seconds
item.iceandfire.hippogryph_sword.desc_0: Always slashes target, dealing extra damage
item.iceandfire.cyclops_eye.desc_1: Inflicts weakness to all nearby hostiles when held
item.iceandfire.siren_flute.desc_0: Makes targets fall in love for 10 seconds
item.iceandfire.siren_flute.desc_1: Mobs in love will not be able to attack
item.iceandfire.hippocampus_slapper.desc: Dazes and slows targets; it's quite confusing to be hit with a fish tail
item.iceandfire.stymphalian_feather_bund: Launches sharp feathers in 8 directions around the user
item.iceandfire.hydra_heart.desc_0: When in hotbar, gives increasing regeneration
item.iceandfire.hydra_heart.desc_1: based on how injured the holder is
item.iceandfire.hydra_arrow.desc: Poisons and leeches life from target
item.iceandfire.summoning_crystal.desc_0: Right click on a dragon to bind it
item.iceandfire.summoning_crystal.desc_1: Use when bound to teleport dragon
dragon.command.new_home: This dragon's home position has been set to %d, %d, %d.
dragon.command.remove_home: This dragon's home position was removed.

hippogryph.command.remove_home: This hippogryph's home position was removed.
cockatrice.command.remove_home: This cockatrice's home position was removed.
cockatrice.command.new_home: This cockatrice's home position has been set to %d, %d, %d.
myrmex.message.raised_reputation: You have raised your reputation with this Myrmex Colony by %d, to %d.
myrmex.message.lowered_reputation: §cYou have lowered your reputation with this Myrmex Colony by %d, to %d.
myrmex.message.peaceful: This Myrmex Colony is now neutral towards you.
myrmex.message.hostile: §cThis Myrmex Colony is now hostile towards you.
myrmex.message.trade: This Myrmex Colony is now willing to trade with you.
myrmex.message.no_trade: §cThis Myrmex Colony will now refuse to trade with you.
myrmex.message.can_use_staff: You can now use a Myrmex Staff on this colony.
myrmex.message.cant_use_staff: §cYou can no longer use a Myrmex Staff on this colony.
myrmex.message.null_hive: This Rouge Myrmex does not have a hive!
myrmex.message.staff_set_named: Staff set to %d's Colony, centered at %d, %d, %d.
myrmex.message.staff_set_unnamed: Staff set to this Myrmex's Colony, centered at %d, %d, %d.
myrmex.message.staff_already_set: §cThis staff is already set to this colony!
myrmex.message.staff_not_set: §cThis staff is not set to any Myrmex Colony.
myrmex.message.dupe_room: §cThere is already a room at this location§r(%d, %d, %d)!
myrmex.message.added_food_room: Added a food room at this location(%d, %d, %d)
myrmex.message.added_nursery_room: Added a nursery room at this location(%d, %d, %d)
myrmex.message.added_misc_room: Added a misc room at this location(%d, %d, %d)
myrmex.message.added_enterance_bottom: Added a Entrance(bottom) room at this location(%d, %d, %d)
myrmex.message.added_enterance_surface: Added a Entrance(surface) room at this location(%d, %d, %d)
amphithere.command.new_home: This amphithere's home position has been set to %d, %d, %d.
lectern.nopages: No new information can be added.
message.iceandfire.noDragonTeleport: §cCould not find a dragon bound to this crystal.
message.iceandfire.dragonGrown: This dragon has grown to Stage
death.attack.dragon.player_0: was split in two by a dragon
death.attack.dragon.player_1: was torn to shreds by a dragon
death.attack.dragon_fire.player_0: was turned into KFC by a dragon
death.attack.dragon_fire.player_2: was turned to ash by a dragon
death.attack.dragon_ice.player_1: was turned to ice by a dragon
death.attack.dragon_ice.player_2: was put into suspended animation by a dragon
death.attack.gorgon.player_0: was turned to stone by a gorgon
death.attack.gorgon.player_1: was turned into gorgonzola by a gorgon
tc.aspect.mythus: Mythological Creature, Legendary Being, Cryptid, Fearsome Critter
advancements.iceandfire.root.title: Ice and Fire
advancements.iceandfire.root.description: Enter a world of magical creatures
advancements.iceandfire.bestiary.title: Book of Monsters
advancements.iceandfire.bestiary.descrip: Using 3 manuscripts found in dungeons, create a bestiary
advancements.iceandfire.lectern.title: Would you Like to Know More?
advancements.iceandfire.lectern.descript: Craft a lectern to learn more about the world of Ice and Fire
advancements.iceandfire.kill_a_dragon.de: Kill an ice dragon or a fire dragon
advancements.iceandfire.dragon_egg.title: Mother of Dragons
advancements.iceandfire.dragon_stick.des: Craft a dragon command staff to control your dragons
advancements.iceandfire.dragon_flute.des: Craft a dragon flute to stop runaway dragons
advancements.iceandfire.dragon_horn.desc: Craft a dragon horn to store dragons
advancements.iceandfire.dragon_meal.desc: Create Dragon Meal to rapidly grow baby dragons
Craft a tool made of dragon bone
advancements.iceandfire.dragonbone_sword: Create the legendary fire or ice dragon weapon
advancements.iceandfire.dragonsteel.desc: Create a dragonsteel ingot from dragon blood and iron
Tame a hippogryph by dropping rabbit feet near it
advancements.iceandfire.gorgon_head.desc: Obtain the gorgons head, a weapon that turns any who look at it to stone
advancements.iceandfire.tame_pixie.title: Here Comes Your Man
advancements.iceandfire.tame_pixie.descr: Befriend a pixie by dropping cake near it
advancements.iceandfire.jar_pixie.title: Surfer Rosa
advancements.iceandfire.jar_pixie.descri: Trap a pixie in a jar to farm the dust
advancements.iceandfire.pixie_wand.title: Where Is My Mind?
advancements.iceandfire.rotten_egg.title: Rotten to the Core
Tame a cockatrice from an egg or by staring at it repeatedly
advancements.iceandfire.kill_siren.title: Tie me to the Mast
advancements.iceandfire.kill_siren.descr: Resist her song and kill a siren
advancements.iceandfire.tame_hippocampus: Tame a hippocampus by feeding it sponges
advancements.iceandfire.kill_deathworm.d: Kill a death worm. Pro tip: they love to eat TNT!
advancements.iceandfire.stymphalian_arro: Craft an arrow from stymhalian bird feathers that flies further
advancements.iceandfire.kill_troll.title: They Have a Cave Troll!
advancements.iceandfire.kill_myrmex.desc: Obtain myrmex chitin from a slain myrmex
advancements.iceandfire.myrmex_resin.tit: Its Like Printing my Own Money!
advancements.iceandfire.myrmex_resin.des: Obtain myrmex resin, the currency of the myrmex
Tame a amphithere by shooting it down and riding it
advancements.iceandfire.tide_trident.des: Throw a tide trident at a mob
advancements.iceandfire.kill_hydra.title: The Twelve Labors of Hercules
item.iceandfire.fire_dragon_blood.jei_de: Obtained by interacting with a dragon corpse while holding an empty bottle.
item.iceandfire.ice_dragon_blood.jei_des: Obtained by interacting with a dragon corpse while holding an empty bottle.
item.iceandfire.dragonegg.jei_desc: Place in an open flame if a fire dragon or underwater if ice dragon and wait a long time. The dragon will bond with the closest player.
item.iceandfire.dragon_skull.jei_desc: Can be placed on the ground or on walls as a trophy.
item.iceandfire.hippogryph_skull.jei_des: Can be placed on the ground or on walls as a trophy.
item.iceandfire.cyclops_skull.jei_desc: Can be placed on the ground or on walls as a trophy.
item.iceandfire.cockatrice_skull.jei_des: Can be placed on the ground or on walls as a trophy.
item.iceandfire.stymphalian_skull.jei_de: Can be placed on the ground or on walls as a trophy.
item.iceandfire.troll_skull.jei_desc: Can be placed on the ground or on walls as a trophy.
item.iceandfire.amphithere_skull.jei_des: Can be placed on the ground or on walls as a trophy.
item.iceandfire.seaserpent_skull.jei_des: Can be placed on the ground or on walls as a trophy.
item.iceandfire.hydra_skull.jei_desc: Can be placed on the ground or on walls as a trophy.
item.iceandfire.fire_stew.jei_desc: Used to breed two male and female dragons. The female will create a nest with an egg afterwards.
item.iceandfire.frost_stew.jei_desc: Used to breed two male and female dragons. The female will create a nest with an egg afterwards.
modifier.splintering2.desc: A souvenir for your enemies!§r\nHits them more to deal more damage.
modifier.splitting2.desc: Two for one!§r\The sudden acceleration of releasing an arrow cause it to split into two.
Three for one!§r\The sudden acceleration of releasing an arrow cause it to split into three.
modifier.hive_defender.desc: For Queen and Colony!§r\nDeals +8 extra damage against death worms and +4 damage against non-arthropods.
modifier.flame2.desc: Burn baby burn!§r\nSets enemies on fire for 15 seconds with added knockbacks, and deals additional dragon flame damage.
modifier.frost2.desc: Ice-ice baby!§r\nFreezes enemies in a block of ice for 15 seconds with added knockback, and deals additional dragon frost damage.
modifier.flame.desc: Burn baby burn!§r\nSets enemies on fire for 10 seconds, and deals additional dragon flame damage.
modifier.frost.desc: Ice-ice baby!§r\nFreezes enemies in a block of ice for 10 seconds, and deals additional dragon frost damage.
modifier.antigravity.desc: Onwards!§r\nThe arrow will maintain its height and will not be effected by gravity for the duration of the flight. Where you aim, it flies.
modifier.arrow_knockback.desc: Up and At 'Um!§r\nThe arrow will inflict strong knockback when it hits an entity.
modifier.sweater_song.desc: "If you want to destroy my sweater..."§r\nTargets wearing armor have a 30% chance of their armor being removed from a critical strike.
modifier.surf_wax_america.desc: "You take your car to work, I'll take my board...:"§r\nDeals an additional 5 damage when players are riding a mount.
modifier.in_the_garage.desc: "In the garage where I belong..."§r\nDeals an additional 5 damage when player is not in direct sunlight.
